sku_name.description: The SKU of Azure Cache's Redis to use. `Basic`, `Standard` and `Premium`.

family.description: The family/pricing group to use. Optionas are `C` for Basic/Standard and `P` for Premium.

capacity.description: The [size](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/details/cache/) (see the numbers following the C or P) of the Redis cache to deploy.
